ID,post_author,post_date,post_date_gmt,post_content,post_title,post_excerpt,post_status,comment_status,ping_status,post_password,post_name,to_ping,pinged,post_modified,post_modified_gmt,post_content_filtered,post_parent,guid,menu_order,post_type,post_mime_type,comment_count
1 1 2013-09-21 13:26:32 2013-09-21 13:26:32 We've been making authentic batiks at our factory on the beautiful Indonesia island of Bali for 30 years. The motifs of each of our batiks are imagined and drawn by hand by our talented textile artists employed at our headquarters in Mission Viejo, Calif. The artwork is sent to our Bali factory where our amazing crew of master craftspeople take the designs and our requests for colorways and produce the most beautiful batiks exclusively for quilters.

Take a peek at our factory and the process via the Hoffman California Fabrics' channel on youtube:

10 1 2013-02-22 11:50:37 2013-02-22 11:50:37 <?php global $wpmem_a, $wpmem_regchk;
$page_url = $_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"].$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
$page_url=str_replace("dev.","",$page_url);
$home_url=str_replace("www.","",home_url());
$home_url=str_replace("dev.","",$home_url);
$home_url=str_replace("http://","",$home_url);
$page_url= str_replace($home_url,"",$page_url);
//echo "Home url is ".$home_url;
//echo "Pageurl is ".$page_url;
$wp_mem_forms="";
$no_reg_form="";

if (is_user_logged_in()) {
	$wp_mem_forms="0";
}
else {//not logged in
	if ( $page_url=='/my-account' || $page_url=='/my-account/') {
		$wp_mem_forms="1";
	}
	if ( $page_url=='/my-account/?password-reset=true') {
		$wp_mem_forms="1";
	}
	if ((strpos($page_url,'/my-account/lost-password')!== false) ) {
		$wp_mem_forms="0";
	}

	if ($wp_mem_forms=="1") {
		if ( $wpmem_a=='login' || $wpmem_regchk =='loginfailed') {
			$no_reg_form="1";
		}
	}
}//not logged in

if ($wp_mem_forms=="1") { 
?>

	We are a wholesale manufacturer that sells to the retail and manufacturing trade only. 
For more information on establishing a wholesale account, call 800-547-0100.
<div class="woocommerce">
    <div class="col2-set" id="customer_login">
        <div class="col-1">
           [wpmem_form login]
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
<?php 
	if ( !$no_reg_form) { ?>
		[wpmem_form register]
  <?php  
    } ?>
 </div>
    </div>
</div>
<?php }//wp_mem forms
else { ?>
	[woocommerce_my_account]

2 1 2018-02-02 04:10:06 2018-02-02 04:10:06 This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

<blockquote>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</blockquote>

...or something like this:

<blockquote>The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.</blockquote>

As a new WordPress user, you should go to <a href="http://hoffmancaliforniafabrics.net/blog/wp-admin/">your dashboard</a> to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun! [box_title class="" border="Middle" ]Some of our Favorites Sites and Resources[/box_title]

[two_fourth class="" last="no" ]

www.pineneedles.com
home of McKenna Ryan, signature designer for Hoffman California Fabrics and quilt-pattern designer extraordinaire

www.bearpawproductions.com
featuring the "Strip Therapy" quilt series using Hoffman Bali Pops® by author Brenda Henning

www.amongbrendasquilts.com
home of Brenda Miller, designer of awesome quilt and accessories projects

www.auntiestwo.com
home of Carol McLeod, prolific designer of amazing handbag and home-dec patterns who creates with  Hoffman Bali Pops® 2-1/2" batik strips.

www.commonthreaddesigns.com
home of wonderfully artistic quilt, home-dec, handbag and embroidery pattern designer Susan Pennoyer.

www.gatewayquiltsnstuff.com
home of quilt teacher, pattern maker and award-winning quilter Toby Lischko

http://laurieshifrindesigns.wordpress.com
pattern book author and designer of "Ripples and Reflections" BOM quilt, made especially for quilt shops

www.jerikelly.com
whimsical and contemporary- yet classic, applique wallhangings.
Take a look!

Judy's Quilts
a collection of beautiful quilts made by quilting instructor Judy Niemeyer

http://pinksandbeachdesigns.com/
darling quilt and tote designs

[/two_fourth]

[two_fourth class="" last="yes" ]

www.Quilting-Time.com
quilt designs by Vicki Stratton

www.thequiltedbutton.com
ingenious quilt patterns by Larene Smith

www.rumpledquiltskins.com
delightful, cuddly soft toys by Kathy Barbro

http://www.stitchinheaven.com/
Texas quilt shop that's behind the awesome "Dancing With The Stars" BOM series using Hoffman Series 1895 Bali Hand-dyes

<strong>We also "like:"</strong>

www.amisimms.net/hoffmanbatiks.html
Ami Simms, instructor, author, pattern maker and director of Alzheimer's Art Quilt Initiative

www.becolourful.nl
quilts by renowned designer Jacqueline De Jonge

www.BinkyPatrol.org
Volunteers who make blankets for children in need of comfort.

http://www.whyquiltsmatter.org
See the PBS documentary and DVD series by Shelly Zegart that illuminates the history and significance of quilting!

&nbsp;

1694 1 2014-02-01 19:37:32 2014-02-01 19:37:32 [one_third class="" last="no" ]<strong>Manufacturers</strong>
Call (800) 527-8050 for our Sportswear and Large Manufacturing Division.[/one_third]

[one_third class="" last="no" ]<strong>Retailers (fabric-shop owners)</strong>
Place orders <a href="http://www.hoffmanfabrics.com/my-account/">online</a>, or call in your order at (800) 547-0100, or contact your <a href="http://www.hoffmanfabrics.com/wholesale-retail-buyers/representative-list/">regional sales rep</a>.[/one_third]

<h3></h3> Catalogs publish closed closed hoffman-fabric-catalogs 2018-01-02 12:32:05 2018-01-02 20:32:05 0 http://www.hoffmanfabrics.com.php53-9.dfw1-1.websitetestlink.com/?page_id=1694 0 page 0
1744 1 2014-03-01 22:40:56 2014-03-01 22:40:56 We offer custom design, print and package programs to a diverse clientele branded in activewear, surfwear, casual lifestyle, accessories and other markets. Manufacturers of any size are welcome to tap our 80-plus years of experience in developing artful specialty prints tailored to their business.

ENJOY THESE BENEFITS &amp; ADVANTAGES WHEN YOU PARTNER WITH US:
<ul>
	<li>Service that excels.  Attention to details.  Prompt delivery.  A partner in your company's success.</li>
	<li>Expert in-house textile artists who specialize in creating original artwork to produce as printed cloth.</li>
	<li>Selection from a large volume of stock inventory with a wide array of motifs, colorways and themes.</li>
	<li>Option of completed production for clients who prefer a package providing finished items ready for sale.  We handle all phases of artwork, printing, sewing, and finishing to exact specifications.</li>
	<li>Advanced solutions and thoughtful creativity to fulfill individual needs.</li>
</ul>
<h5><a href="http://hoffmanfabrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/artroom.jpg"><img class="alignright size-medium wp-image-8911" src="http://hoffmanfabrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/artroom-300x225.jpg" alt="artroom" width="300" height="225" /></a>RELY ON US TO HANDLE EVERY ASPECT OF THE TEXTILE-MANUFACTURING PROCESS – FROM DESIGN CONCEPT TO COMPLETED ARTWORK TO PRINTED FABRIC AND/OR FINISHED ITEM DELIVERY.</h5>
We successfully have navigated years of industry changes through our versatility, entrepreneurial spirit and deep passion for excellence in design and production.  We continue to lead with sophisticated fabrics and superior goods, commitment to reliability and excellence, and ability to mine unlimited creative and business resources.

Learn more about how a unique Hoffman California fabric can elevate your product, business and brand.
<h4><strong>Call (800) 527-8050 or email manufacturing@hoffmanfabrics.com or info@hoffmanfabrics.com.</strong></h4>
